item.title: Have you been to a State of the Map, big or small, anytime in the last couple of years? Where was it? What did you learn? What is the best reason (or reasons) to go? #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotM #gischat The generic ‚ÄúState of the Map‚Äù logo from OpenStreetMap
Original Programme for #SotMFR2023 https://sotm2023.openstreetmap.fr/programme.html

Videos from the recent State of the Map France 2023 are available on #peertube videos: https://peertube.openstreetmap.fr/c/sotm_fr_2023/videos @openstreetmap.fr #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotM #SotMFR #SoMFR2023

Great enthusiasm for OpenStreetMap and open data coming across in this intro talk by Anne-Karoline Distel ( @BUnicycling ). Her use case is recording detailed local history in Ireland! What's yours? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5nxIoJ9dEA4 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #history #ireland

Some photos from State of the Map US which recently took place in Richmond! #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotM #SotMUS https://2023.stateofthemap.us/ https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:State_of_the_Map_U.S._2023

‚ÄúWe aren't the most active subreddit but as part of the open-source/data community we should participate. Even though the Reddit and OSM are not comparable. The latter would be nothing without third party apps like JOSM, OsmAnd, StreetComplete or Vespucci.‚Äù #OpenStreetMap #OSM #reddit
The full r/OpenStreetMap mod statement & announcement is here https://www.reddit.com/r/openstreetmap/comments/1446645/we_are_going_black_from_the_12th_of_june_for_at/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #reddit

The r/OpenStreetMap subreddit is temporarily closing for a few days, as part of the site wide protest against the proposed new reddit changes which would adversely affect the community there. https://www.reddit.com/r/openstreetmap #OpenStreetMap #reddit #OSM #gis
Happy Pride Month mappers! #lgbtq #lgb #trans #queer #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gis #gischat The OpenStreetMap logo, but in Rainbow LGBTQ pride colours

In this blog post Grant Slater recounts a busy first year as #OpenStreetMap's first site reliability engineer. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/05/22/powering-openstreetmaps-future-a-year-of-improvements-from-openstreetmap-foundations-site-reliability-engineer/ #OSM #gischat #maps
Last #sotm news of the day, "Virginia is for Mappers" at the @sotmus event in Richmond, VA which, like SOTM Fr is on June 9 - 11. https://2023.stateofthemap.us/

There's more #sotm news! @sotmafrica has its call for proposals up and its fundraising prospectus up. What a great opportunity to flex your knowledge and fund #sotmafrica2023 https://pretalx.com/sotm-africa-2023/cfp
Also in #sotm news is #sotmeu in Antwerp. Details and sponsorship packet are up! European mappers, start thinking about what you want to present! stateofthemap.eu
May 31 is also the deadline to submit to host @sotm in 2024!
May 31 is the deadline for proposals to host @SotmAsia 2023. Procrastinators take note! https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/State_of_the_Map_Asia_2023/Call_for_venues

If you have a #sotm or other mapping event coming up, tag this account in your post or DM us! It will help us see your event. (We love to spread the OSM ‚ù§Ô∏è but the CWG are volunteers, too, so we don't always see everything. ü§™) #gischat #OpenStreetMap #OSM

Next up for fundraising is a Q&A session on Friday June 9 at #sotmus in Richmond, VA to talk about how we can fund the future of OSM. Stop by for a discussion with @mikel @grischard @arnalielsewhere and @alanmustard and @SurvivalByBook (Courtney C)

The OSM/F has new fundraising guidelines--check them out on the blog and add your comments. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/05/02/ethical-guidelines-for-fundraising-at-the-openstreetmap-foundation/

To date, the international #OpenSteetMap conference, #StateoftheMap, has visited 15 countries and 4 continents. Where is it going in 2024? We'll find out soon as the application deadline is now less than two weeks away! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/04/06/state-of-the-map-2024-call-for-venues-open/ #gischat #OSM #SotM

The #OpenStreetMap Foundation invites community members to contribute to the development of the strategic plan. You can read the current draft at wiki.osmfoundation.org/wiki/Cluster_B and there is a lot of discussion at https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/osmf-strategy-2023/98670 #OSM #maps #gischat
